original_text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant, and on them that are out of the way; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity.
korean_text: 그가 무식하고 미혹된 자를 능히 용납할 수 있는 것은 자기도 연약에 휩싸여 있음이라

sentences.original_text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 무지한 자들을 불쌍히 여길 수 있는가

sentences.original_text: and on them that are out of the way
for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그 자신도 연약함에 둘러싸여 있기 때문이다
